text: “Digau Levi dolomeenei la guu hai nia daangada ni aagu. Dogu madagoaa ne daaligi nia ulu mmaadua dama daane o digau Egypt huogodoo, Au ne hagadabu mai gi di Au nia ulu mmaadua dama daane o nia madahaanau huogodoo o digau Israel, mo nia ulu mmaadua o nadau manu. Dolomeenei nia ulu mmaadua dama daane o digau Israel ga hagalee hai nia daangada ni aagu, go digau Levi ala gaa hai digau ni aagu. Au go Dimaadua.”3.12-13 Exodus 13.2
